tips.li: Flim: "Don't let the curtain hit ya on the way out."
Flam: "With our machine, we can make enough cider in one hour to satisfy this entire town!"
King Sombra: "It's cute that you think that will do anything."
Queen Chrysalis: "What a lovely but absolutely ridiculous sentiment."
Zecora: "Beware! Beware, you pony folk! Those leaves of blue are not a joke!"
The Flim and Flam plush increases your pawns conversion power.
The King Sombra plush can be given to your slaves to further increase their suppression.
The Queen Chrysalis plush can be given to your wardens to make them more effective at suppressing your slaves.
The Harmony precept requires the Individualist meme, and applies powerful bonuses to all of your colonists.
